*kai=sar d' w(s au)tw=| sune/mice dia\ nukto\s to\ a)po\ th=s *)ammaou=s

pro/eisin, e)/nqen h(/ te po/lis h)/dh katefai/neto kai\ to\ tou= naou=
me/geqos e)kla/mpon, kaqa\ tw=| borei/w| kli/mati th=s po/lews xqamalo\s
suna/ptwn o( xw=ros e)tu/mws *skopo\s w)no/mastai. th=s de\ po/lews
stadi/ous e(pta\ die/xwn e)ke/leuse peribale/sqai strato/pedon toi=s du/o
ta/gmasin o(mou=, to\ de\ pe/mpton tou/twn o)pi/sw trisi\ stadi/ois: ko/pw|
ga\r th=s dia\ nukto\s porei/as tetrume/nous e)do/kei ske/phs a)ci/ous ei)=nai, 
w(s a)\n a)dee/steron teixi/sainto. katarxome/nwn d' a)/rti th=s domh/sews
kai\ to\ de/katon ta/gma dia\ *(ierixou=ntos h)/dh parh=n, e)/nqa kaqh=sto/
tis o(plitikh\ moi=ra frourou=sa th\n e)mbolh\n u(po\ *ou)espasianou=
prokateilhmme/nhn. prosete/takto d' au)toi=s e(\c a)pe/xontas tw=n *(ierosolu/mwn 
stadi/ous stratopedeu/sasqai kata\ to\ *)elaiw=n kalou/menon 
o)/ros, o(\ th=| po/lei pro\s a)natolh\n a)nti/keitai me/sh| fa/raggi

*tw=n d' a)na\ to\ a)/stu surrhgnume/nwn a)dialei/ptws to/te
prw=ton a)ne/pausen th\n e)p' a)llh/lois e)/rin o( e)/cwqen po/lemos e)cai/fnhs
polu\s e)pelqw/n: kai\ met' e)kplh/cews oi( stasiastai\ tou\s *(rwmai/ous
a)forw=ntes stratopedeuome/nous trixh= kakh=s o(monoi/as kath/rxonto
kai\ lo/gon a)llh/lois e)di/dosan, ti/ me/noien h)\ ti/ paqo/ntes a)ne/xointo

tou/tois a)qroi/zontes a)llh/lous parekro/toun, kai\ ta\s panopli/as a(rpa/santes 
ai)fnidi/ws e)pekqe/ousi tw=| deka/tw| ta/gmati kai\ dia\ th=s

tou=to ta\ polla\ teqeiko/tes tw=n o(/plwn, ou)/te ga\r qarrh/sein tou\s
*)ioudai/ous pro\s e)kdromh\n u(pela/mbanon kai\ proqumoume/nwn perispasqh/sesqai

to/te prolhfqe/ntes oi( *(rwmai=oi tai=s e)mbolai=s ei)=kon. kai\ o(po/te

a)ei\ de\ plhquou/shs th=s e)kdromh=s ma=llon taratto/menoi teleutai=on
a)po\ tou= stratope/dou tre/pontai. kai\ dokei= to/te a)\n kinduneu=sai
to\ ta/gma pa=n, ei) mh\ *ti/tos a)ggelqe\n au)tw=| ta/xos e)peboh/qhse, kai\
polla\ o)neidi/sas ei)s a)nandri/an e)pistre/fei me\n tou\s feu/gontas,
au)to\s de\ plagi/ois toi=s *)ioudai/ois prospesw\n meq' w(=n h(=ken e)pile/ktwn 
suxnou\s me\n a)nairei=, titrw/skei de\ plei/ous, tre/petai de\
pa/ntas kai\ sunwqei= kata\ th=s fa/raggos. oi( d' e)n tw=| kata/ntei

*lwfh/santos de\ pro\s braxu\ tou= qu/raze pole/mou pa/lin

e)qe/lontas ei)/sw, *)iwa/nnhs de\ proka/lumma th=s e)piboulh=s poihsa/menos 
th\n e(orth\n tw=n su\n au)tw=| kruptoi=s o(/plois e)nskeua/sas tou\s a)shmote/rous,

proelqo/ntes e)/cw tw=n *gunaikei/wn kaloume/nwn pu/rgwn, w(s e)kbeblhme/noi

tw=n *(rwmai/wn e)/fodon a)neilou=nto kai\ par' a)llh/lous u(pe/pthsson.
oi( de\ diasta/ntes e)pi\ tou= tei/xous dh=mos ei)=nai dokw=n ei)rh/nhn e)bo/wn

ta\s ei)so/dous u(pekri/nonto kai\ tou\s e)/ndon i(keteu/ein, sunexw=s te pro\s

*)ioudai/ois o(dou\s kata/ te a)na/gkhn kai\ di' e)mpeiri/an: ei) de/ ti la/qra
pareiskomisqh/soito, tribh\n e)/sesqai plei/ona th=| poliorki/a|. dedie/nai 
te mh\ th\n do/can tou= katorqw/matos au)tw=| to\ mh=kos e)lattw/sh|
tou= xro/nou: tou/tw| me\n ga\r ei)=nai pa=n a)nu/simon, pro\s de\ th=s eu)klei/as 
to\ ta/xos. dei=n ge mh/n, ei) kai\ tw=| ta/xei met' a)sfalei/as
bou/loito xrh/sasqai, periteixi/zein o(/lhn th\n po/lin: mo/nws ga\r
ou(/tws a)\n pa/sas a)pofra/cai ta\s e)co/dous, kai\ *)ioudai/ous h)\ pro\s
a(/panta a)pogno/ntas th\n swthri/an paradw/sein th\n po/lin h)\ limw/ttontas 
xeirwqh/sesqai r(a|di/ws: ou)de\ ga\r h)remh/sein au)to\s a)/llws,
a)lla\ kai\ tw=n xwma/twn e)pimelh/sesqai pa/lin xrw/menos toi=s kwlu/ousin 
a)tonwte/rois. ei) de/ tw| me/ga dokei= kai\ dush/nuton to\ e)/rgon,
xrh=nai skopei=n, w(s ou)/te *(rwmai/ois ti mikro\n e)nergei=n pre/pei, kai\

*tou/tois pei/sas tou\s h(gemo/nas diane/mein e)ke/leuse ta\s duna/meis 
e)pi\ to\ e)/rgon. o(rmh\ de/ tis e)mpi/ptei daimo/nios toi=s stratiw/tais, 
kai\ merisame/nwn to\n peri/bolon ou) mo/non tw=n tagma/twn
h)=n e)/ris, a)lla\ kai\ tw=n e)n au)toi=s ta/cewn pro\s a)llh/las, kai\ stratiw/ths 
me\n dekada/rxhn, dekada/rxhs d' e(katonta/rxhn, ou(=tos d' e)spou/dazen 
a)re/sasqai xili/arxon, tw=n de\ xilia/rxwn e)pi\ tou\s h(gemo/nas
e)/teinen h( filotimi/a kai\ tw=n h(gemo/nwn th\n a(/millan e)bra/beue *kai=sar:
periiw\n ga\r au)to\s e(ka/sths h(me/ras polla/kis e)pesko/pei to\ e)/rgon.
a)rca/menos de\ a)po\ th=s *)assuri/wn parembolh=s, kaq' h(\n au)to\s e)stratopedeu/sato, 
e)pi\ th\n katwte/rw *kaino/polin h)=ge to\ tei=xos, e)/nqen
dia\ tou= *kedrw=nos e)pi\ to\ *)elaiw=n o)/ros: ei)=t' a)naka/mptwn kata\
meshmbri/an perilamba/nei to\ o)/ros a)/xri th=s *peristerew=nos kaloume/nhs 
pe/tras to/n te e(ch=s lo/fon, o(\s e)pi/keitai th=| kata\ th\n *silwa\m
fa/raggi, ka)kei=qen e)kkli/nas pro\s du/sin ei)s th\n th=s phgh=s kath/|ei
fa/ragga. meq' h(\n a)nabai/nwn kata\ to\ *)ana/nou tou= a)rxiere/ws mnhmei=on 
kai\ dialabw\n to\ o)/ros, e)/nqa *pomph/ios e)stratopedeu/sato,
pro\s kli/ma bo/reion e)pe/strefe, kai\ proelqw\n me/xri kw/mhs tino/s,
*)erebi/nqwn oi)=kos kalei=tai, kai\ met' e)kei/nhn to\ *(hrw/dou mnhmei=on
perisxw\n kata\ a)natolh\n tw=| i)di/w| stratope/dw| sunh=pten, o(/qen h)/rcato. 
to\ me\n ou)=n tei=xos e(no\s de/ontos tessara/konta stadi/wn h)=n,
e)/cwqen d' au)tw=| prosw|kodomh/qh triskai/deka frou/ria, kai\ tou/twn
oi( ku/kloi de/ka sunhriqmou=nto stadi/wn. trisi\ d' w)|kodomh/qh to\
pa=n h(me/rais, w(s to\ me\n e)/rgon mhnw=n [ei)=nai] a)/cion, to\ ta/xos d'
h(tta=sqai pi/stews. periklei/sas de\ tw=| tei/xei th\n po/lin kai\ du/namin
toi=s frouri/ois e)gkatasth/sas th\n me\n prw/thn fulakh\n th=s nukto\s
periiw\n au)to\s e)peske/pteto, th\n deute/ran d' e)pe/treyen *)aleca/ndrw|,
th\n tri/thn d' e)/laxon oi( tw=n tagma/twn h(gemo/nes. dieklhrou=nto d'
oi( fu/lakes tou\s u(/pnous, kai\ di' o(/lhs nukto\s perih/|esan kata\ diasth/mata 
tw=n frouri/wn.

*)ioudai/ois de\ meta\ tw=n e)co/dwn a)peko/ph pa=sa swthri/as
e)lpi/s, kai\ baqu/nas au(to\n o( limo\s kat' oi)/kous kai\ genea\s to\n dh=mon
e)pebo/sketo. kai\ ta\ me\n te/gh peplh/rwto gunaikw=n kai\ brefw=n
lelume/nwn, oi( stenwpoi\ de\ gero/ntwn nekrw=n, pai=des de\ kai\ neani/ai
dioidou=ntes w(/sper ei)/dwla kata\ ta\s a)gora\s a)neilou=nto kai\ kate/pipton 
o(/ph| tina\ to\ pa/qos katalamba/noi. qa/ptein de\ tou\s prosh/kontas 
ou)/te i)/sxuon oi( ka/mnontes kai\ to\ dieutonou=n w)/knei dia/ te
plh=qos tw=n nekrw=n kai\ dia\ to\ kata\ sfa=s a)/dhlon: polloi\ gou=n
toi=s u(p' au)tw=n qaptome/nois e)pape/qnhskon, polloi\ de\ e)pi\ ta\s
qh/kas pri\n e)pisth=nai to\ xrew\n proh=lqon. ou)/te de\ qrh=nos e)n tai=s
sumforai=s ou)/t' o)lofurmo\s h)=n, a)ll' o( limo\s h)/legxe ta\ pa/qh, chroi=s 
de\ toi=s o)/mmasi kai\ seshro/si toi=s sto/masin oi( dusqanatou=ntes
e)few/rwn tou\s fqa/santas a)napau/sasqai, baqei=a de\ periei=xen 
th\n po/lin sigh\ kai\ nu\c qana/tou ge/mousa kai\ tou/twn oi( lh|stai\ xalepw/teroi. 
tumbwruxou=ntes gou=n ta\s oi)ki/as e)su/lwn tou\s nekrou\s kai\
ta\ kalu/mmata tw=n swma/twn perispw=ntes meta\ ge/lwtos e)ch/|esan,
ta/s te a)kma\s tw=n cifw=n e)doki/mazon e)n toi=s ptw/masin, kai/ tinas
tw=n e)rrimme/nwn e)/ti zw=ntas dih/launon e)pi\ pei/ra| tou= sidh/rou: tou\s
d' i(keteu/ontas xrh=sai sfi/si decia\n kai\ ci/fos tw=| limw=| kate/leipon
u(perhfanou=ntes, kai\ tw=n e)kpneo/ntwn e(/kastos a)teni/sas ei)s to\n nao\n
a)few/ra tou\s stasiasta\s zw=ntas a)polipw/n. oi( de\ to\ me\n prw=ton
e)k tou= dhmosi/ou qhsaurou= tou\s nekrou\s qa/ptein e)ke/leuon th\n o)smh\n 
ou) fe/rontes, e)/peiq' w(s ou) dih/rkoun a)po\ tw=n teixw=n e)/rripton
ei)s ta\s fa/raggas.

*periiw\n de\ tau/tas o( *ti/tos w(s e)qea/sato peplhsme/nas tw=n

ei)/h to\ e)/rgon au)tou=. ta\ me\n dh\ kata\ th\n po/lin ei)=xen ou(/tws, *(rwmai=oi 
de\ mhdeno\s e)/ti tw=n stasiastw=n e)ktre/xontos, h)/dh ga\r kai\
tou/twn a)qumi/a kai\ limo\s e)fh/pteto, e)p' eu)qumi/ais h)=san si/tou te

kai\ polu\ plh=qos tw=n: e)dwdi/mwn e)pideiknu/menoi tw=| kata\ sfa=s
ko/rw| to\n limo\n tw=n polemi/wn e)ce/kaion. pro\s de\ to\ pa/qos tw=n
stasiastw=n mhde\n e)ndido/ntwn *ti/tos oi)ktei/rwn ta\ lei/yana tou= dh/mou 
kai\ spouda/zwn to\ gou=n perio\n e)carpa/sai, pa/lin h)/rxeto xwma/twn

a)p' e)nenh/konta stadi/wn oi( stratiw=tai. kai\ pro\s mo/nhs u(/youn

ga\r pa/qos au)tw=n h(me/rou th\n yuxh\n ou)/t' a)lghdw\n h(/pteto tou=
sw/matos, oi(/ ge kai\ nekro\n to\n dh=mon w(/sper ku/nes e)spa/ratton kai\

au)tou= su/mboulon w(s a)\n e)c a(plo/thtos gegenhme/non. a)xqe/nta de\

tw=n te/knwn kai\ tau/thn ai)tou/menon th\n xa/rin a)nq' w(=n a)noi/ceien
au)tw=| th\n po/lin, teleutai=on a)nelei=n e)ke/leusen. o( me\n ou)=n e)n o)/yei

ou(/tw ga\r o( *si/mwn *)ana/nw| tw=| *bagada/tou prose/tacen, o(\s h)=n w)mo/tatos

kai\ o( grammateu\s th=s boulh=s *)aristeu/s, ge/nos e)c *)ammaou=s, kai\

*)iwtapa/twn tou=to e)/fh pepei=sqai: kai\ ga\r ou)de\ zw=ntos a)polau/ein:

*tw=n d' au)tomo/lwn oi( me\n u(p' a)na/gkhs a)po\ tou= tei/xous

e)ndei/as pefushme/noi kai\ w(/sper u(drwpiw=ntes, e)/peita a)qro/ws kenoi=s

fwra=tai tw=n th=s gastro\s luma/twn xrusou=s e)kle/gwn: katapi/nontes

kai\ polu\ plh=qos h)=n e)n th=| po/lei xrusou=: dw/deka gou=n
*)attikw=n w)nou=nto pro/teron i)sxu/ontas pe/nte kai\ ei)/kosin. a)lla/ toi
th=s e)pinoi/as e)legxqei/shs di' e(no\s a)napi/mplatai me\n fh/mhs ta\
strato/peda, w(s mestoi\ xrusi/ou parei=en oi( au)to/moloi, to\ de\ tw=n
*)ara/bwn plh=qos kai\ oi( *su/roi tou\s i(ke/tas a)nate/mnontes h)reu/nwn

*)ioudai/ois xalepw/teron: mia=| gou=n a)nesxi/sqhsan nukti\ pro\s disxili/ous.

*kai\ gnou\s th\n paranomi/an *ti/tos o)li/gou me\n e)de/hse to\ i(ppiko\n

*)ioudai/ous mi/sei *(rwmai/ous e)pigra/fousi: kai\ ga\r nu=n e)ni/ous au)tw=|
tw=n stratiwtw=n sunapolau/ein th=s kakodoci/as. tou/tois me\n ou)=n
dihpei/lhse qa/naton, ei)/ tis eu(reqei/h pa/lin to\ au)to\ tolmw=n, toi=s
de\ a)po\ tw=n tagma/twn e)pe/stellen e)reunh/santas tou\s u(po/ptous a)na/gein 
e)p' au)to/n. katefro/nei d', w(s e)/oike, filoxrhmati/a pa/shs
kola/sews, kai\ deino\s e)mpe/fuken a)nqrw/pois tou= kerdai/nein e)/rws,
ou)de/n te ou(/tws pa/qos pleoneci/a paraba/lletai. h)\ tau=ta me\n a)/llws
kai\ me/tron e)/xei kai\ fo/bois u(pota/ssetai, qeo\s de\ h)=n o( tou= laou=
panto\s katakri/nas kai\ pa=san au)toi=s swthri/as o(do\n ei)s a)pw/leian
a)postre/fwn. o(\ gou=n met' a)peilh=s a)pei=pen o( *kai=sar la/qra kata\
tw=n au)tomo/lwn e)tolma=to, kai\ tou\s diadidra/skontas pri\n pa=sin
o)fqh=nai proapantw=ntes e)/sfatton oi( ba/rbaroi, periskopou/menoi
de\ mh/ tis e)pi/doi *(rwmai/wn, a)ne/sxizon ka)k tw=n spla/gxnwn to\ miaro\n

*)iwa/nnhs d' w(s e)pe/leipon ai( a(rpagai\ para\ tou= dh/mou, pro\s

*kai\ ti/ dei= kata\ me/ros e)kdihgei=sqai ta\s sumfora/s; a)lla\

e(/ndeka nekrw=n e)pi\ pentakisxili/ois o)ktakosi/ois o)gdoh/konta, a)f' h(=s

e)kfe/rein [e)/legon] susswreu/ontas ei)s tou\s megi/stous oi)/kous ta\ ptw/mata

*ta\ me\n ou)=n tw=n *(ierosolu/mwn pa/qh prou/kopten kaq'
h(me/ran e)pi\ to\ xei=ron tw=n te stasiastw=n ma=llon parocunome/nwn
e)n tai=s sumforai=s kai\ tou= limou= meta\ to\n dh=mon h)/dh ka)kei/nous
nemome/nou. to/ ge mh\n plh=qos tw=n seswreume/nwn a)na\ th\n po/lin
ptwma/twn o)/yei te frikw=des h)=n kai\ loimw/dh prose/ballen o)smh\n
pro/s te ta\s e)kdroma\s e)mpo/dion toi=s maxome/nois: w(/sper ga\r dia\

patei=n. oi( d' e)pibai/nontes ou)/t' e)/fritton ou)/t' h)le/oun ou)/te klh|do/na

u(/brin, pefurme/noi d' o(mofu/lw| fo/nw| ta\s decia\s e)pi\ to\n pro\s tou\s
a)llofu/lous po/lemon e)ce/qeon, o)neidi/zontes, e)/moige dokei=n, to\ qei=on

h)=n d' e)leeinh\ kai\ th=s gh=s h( qe/a: ta\ ga\r pa/lai de/ndresi kai\ paradei/sois

u(/lhn, ou)dei/s te th\n pa/lai *)ioudai/an kai\ ta\ perikallh= proa/steia

*oi( de\ peri\ to\n *)iwa/nnhn kata\ th\n *)antwni/an a(/ma kai\ pro\s

tou\s kriou\s e)pe/qento toi=s e)/rgois. ou) mh\n e)kra/thsa/n ge
th=s e)pixeirh/sews, a)lla\ proelqo/ntes meta\ lampa/dwn pri\n e)ggi/sai

ou)d' o(monoei=n h( ske/yis au)tw=n e)w/|kei kata\ me/ros e)kphdw/ntwn ka)k
dialeimma/twn kai\ memellhme/nws meta\ de/ous kaqo/lou te ei)pei=n ou)k
*)ioudai+kw=s: ta\ ga\r i)/dia tou= e)/qnous u(ste/rhto a(/ma h( to/lma kai\
o(rmh\ kai\ dro/mos o(mou= pa/ntwn kai\ to\ mhde\ ptai/ontas a)nastre/fein.
a)tonw/teroi d' e(autw=n proelqo/ntes kai\ tou\s *(rwmai/ous eu(=ron e)rrwmene/steron 
tou= sunh/qous paratetagme/nous: toi=s me/n ge sw/masi kai\
tai=s panopli/ais ou(/tws e)fra/canto ta\ xw/mata pa/ntoqen w(s tw=| puri\
mhdamo/qen katalipei=n para/dusin, th\n de\ yuxh\n e)to/nwsan e(/kastos
mh\ metakinhqh=nai th=s ta/cews pro\ qana/tou. pro\s ga\r tw=| pa/sas
au)tw=n u(poko/ptesqai ta\s e)lpi/das, ei) ka)kei=na kataflegei/h ta\ e)/rga,
deinh\ tou\s stratiw/tas ei)=xen ai)dw/s, ei) pa/nta krath/seian panourgi/a
me\n a)reth=s, a)po/noia d' o(/plwn, plh=qos d' e)mpeiri/as, *)ioudai=oi de\
*(rwmai/wn. a(/ma de\ ta)feth/ria sunh/rgei tw=n prophdw/ntwn e)fiknou/mena, 
kai\ pesw/n tis tw=| meq' au(to\n e)mpo/dion h)=n, o(/ te ki/ndunos
tou= pro/sw xwrei=n e)poi/ei malakwte/rous. tw=n d' e)ndote/rw be/lous
u(podramo/ntwn oi( me\n pri\n ei)s xei=ras e)lqei=n th\n eu)taci/an kai\ to\

a)naxwrhsa/ntwn de\ tw=n *)ioudai/wn prosh=gon oi( *(rwmai=oi ta\s e(lepo/leis,

sidh/rw| kai\ panti\ tw=| xorhgoume/nw| *)ioudai/ois u(po\ th=s a)na/gkhs be/lei:
kai/per ga\r polu\ tw=| tei/xei pepoiqo/tes kai\ tw=n o)rga/nwn katafronou=ntes

spoudh\n tw=n *)ioudai/wn tou= mh\ plhgh=nai th\n *)antwni/an u(polamba/nontes

w(s d' h)=san e)la/ttous kai\ perieqrau/onto tai=s pe/trais, e(/teroi tou\s
qureou\s o)rofw/santes u(pe\r tw=n swma/twn xersi\ kai\ moxloi=s u(pw/rutton 
tou\s qemeli/ous, kai\ te/ssara/s ge li/qous proskarterh/santes
e)ce/seisan. a)ne/pause de\ nu\c e(kate/rous, ka)n tau/th| to\ tei=xos u(po\
tw=n kriw=n sesaleume/non, kai\ kaq' o(\ toi=s prote/rois e)pibouleu/wn
xw/masin o( *)iwa/nnhs u(pw/rucen e)ndou/shs th=s diw/ruxos, e)capi/nhs

*nomi/zwn de\ o( *ti/tos e)gei/resqai ma/lista ta\s tw=n polemou/ntwn

ga\r kai\ limo\s kai\ poliorki/a kai\ di/xa mhxanhma/twn pi/ptonta tei/xh
ti/ a)\n a)ll' h)\ qeou= me\n ei)/h mh=nis e)kei/nois, boh/qeia de\ h(mete/ra; to\
toi/nun mh\ mo/non e)lattou=sqai xeiro/nwn, a)lla\ kai\ th\n qei/an summaxi/an

*)ioudai/ous me/n, oi(=s ou) pollh\n ai)sxu/nhn fe/rei to\ lei/pesqai maqou=si

u(mnei=n a)/rti th\n e)n pole/mw| teleuth\n kai\ th\n e)pi\ toi=s a)reimani/ois

a)\n u(mi=n a)nai/makton to\ kato/rqwma ge/noito mo/non katarcame/nois:
a)nabai/nontas me\n ga\r kwlu/ein peira/sontai kata\ to\ ei)ko/s, laqo/ntas
de\ kai\ biasame/nous a(/pac ou)k a)\n u(postai=en e)/ti, ka)\n o)li/goi fqa/shte. 
to\n de\ katarca/menon ai)sxunoi/mhn a)\n ei) mh\ poih/saimi zhlwto\n 
e)n tai=s e)pikarpi/ais, kai\ o( me\n zw=n a)/rcei tw=n nu=n o(moi/wn,
makarista\ d' a)kolouqh/sei kai\ toi=s pesou=si ta\ a)ristei=a.

*toiau=ta tou= *ti/tou diecio/ntos to\ me\n a)/llo plh=qos e)/deise
tou= kindu/nou to\ me/geqos, tw=n d' e)n tai=s spei/rais strateuome/nwn
*sabi=nos tou)/noma, ge/nos a)po\ *suri/as, a)nh\r kai\ kata\ xei=ra kai\ kata\
yuxh\n a)/ristos e)fa/nh. kai/toi proi+dw\n a)/n tis au)to\n a)po/ ge th=s
swmatikh=s e(/cews ou)d' ei)kai=on ei)=nai stratiw/thn e)/doce: me/las me\n
ga\r h)=n th\n xroi/an, i)sxno/s, th\n sa/rka pepilhme/nos, a)ll' e)nw/|kei tis
h(rwikh\ yuxh\ leptw=| sw/mati kai\ polu\ th=s i)di/as a)lkh=s stenote/rw|.
prw=tos gou=n a)nasta/s e)pidi/dwmi/ soi, *kai=sar, e)/fh, proqu/mws
e)mauto/n. prw=tos a)nabai/nw to\ tei=xos. kai\ eu)/xomai me/n mou th=| te
i)sxu/i kai\ th=| gnw/mh| th\n sh\n a)kolouqh=sai tu/xhn, ei) de\ nemeshqei/hn
th=s e)pibolh=s, i)/sqi mh/ me ptai/santa par' e)lpi/das, a)ll' u(pe\r sou=
kri/sei to\n qa/naton h(|rhme/non. tau=ta ei)pw\n kai\ th=| me\n a)ristera=|
xeiri\ to\n qureo\n u(pe\r th=s kefalh=s a)natei/nas, th=| decia=| de\ to\ ci/fos
spasa/menos e)xw/rei pro\s to\ tei=xos peri\ w(/ran ma/lista th=s h(me/ras
e(/kthn. ei(/ponto d' au)tw=| kai\ tw=n a)/llwn e(/ndeka mo/noi zhlwtai\ th=s
a)ndrei/as geno/menoi: proh=ge de\ polu\ pa/ntwn o( a)nh\r o(rmh=| tini daimoni/w| 
xrw/menos. oi( frouroi\ de\ a)po\ tou= tei/xous kathko/ntizo/n te
au)tou\s kai\ be/lesi pa/ntoqen a)pei/rois e)/ballon kai\ pe/tras e)caisi/ous
kateku/lion, ai(\ e)k tw=n me\n e(/ndeka pare/suran e)ni/ous, o( de\ *sabi=nos
a)pantw=n toi=s a)fieme/nois kai\ kataxwnnu/menos u(po\ tw=n belw=n ou)
pro/teron e)pe/sxe th\n o(rmh\n h)\ gene/sqai te e)p' a)/krw| kai\ tre/yasqai 
tou\s polemi/ous: kataplage/ntes ga\r au)tou= th/n te du/namin oi( *)ioudai=oi 
kai\ to\ para/sthma th=s yuxh=s, a(/ma de\ kai\ plei/ous a)nabebhke/nai 
do/cantes e)tra/phsan. e)/nqa dh\ katame/myait' a)/n tis w(s fqonera\n 
e)pi\ tai=s a)retai=s th\n tu/xhn kai\ kwlu/ousan a)ei\ ta\ para/doca
tw=n katorqwma/twn. o( gou=n a)nh\r ou(=tos o(/t' e)kra/thse th=s e)pibolh=s,
e)sfa/lh kai\ ptai/sas pro/s tini pe/tra| prhnh\s e)p' au)th\n meta\ megi/stou 
yo/fou kate/pesen: e)pistrafe/ntes de\ oi( *)ioudai=oi kai\ katido/ntes 
mo/non te au)to\n kai\ peptwko/ta, pa/ntoqen e)/ballon. o( d'
e)s go/nu dianasta\s kai\ prokaluya/menos to\n qureo\n to\ me\n prw=ton
h)mu/neto kai\ pollou\s tw=n plhsiasa/ntwn e)/trwsen: au)=qis d' u(po\
plh/qous trauma/twn parh=ke th\n decia\n kai\ te/los pri\n a)podou=nai
th\n yuxh\n katexw/sqh toi=s be/lesin, a)nh\r a)/cios me\n a)mei/noni xrh=sqai 
di' a)ndrei/an kai\ tu/xh|, pesw\n de\ th=s e)pibolh=s a)nalo/gws. tw=n
de\ a)/llwn trei=s me\n tou\s h)/dh pro\s toi=s a)/krois o)/ntas suntri/yantes
a)pe/kteinan toi=s li/qois, oi( de\ o)ktw\ traumati/ai katasure/ntes a)nekomi/sqhsan 
ei)s to\ strato/pedon. tau=ta me\n ou)=n tri/th| mhno\s *pane/mou
e)pra/xqh.

*meta\ d' h(me/ras du/o tw=n prokoitou/ntwn tine\s e)pi\ toi=s xw/masi 
fula/kwn ei)/kosi sunelqo/ntes prospoiou=ntai me\n to\n tou= pe/mptou 
ta/gmatos shmaiafo/ron kai\ du/o tina\s tw=n e)n tai=s i)/lais i(ppe/wn
kai\ salpikth\n e(/na, kata\ de\ w(/ran th=s nukto\s e)na/thn prosbai/nousi
me\n h(suxh= dia\ tw=n e)reipi/wn e)pi\ th\n *)antwni/an, a)posfa/cantes de\
tou\s prw/tous tw=n frourw=n koimwme/nous kratou=si tou= tei/xous kai\ 
tw=| salpikth=| shmai/nein e)ke/leusan. pro\s o(\ tw=n me\n a)/llwn fula/kwn
e)cana/stasis ai)fni/dios h)=n kai\ fugh\ pri/n tina to\ plh=qos e)pidei=n
tw=n e)pibebhko/twn: o(/ te ga\r fo/bos kai\ h( sa/lpigc fantasi/an au)toi=s
tou= plh=qos a)nabebhke/nai polemi/wn parei=xe. *kai=sar de\ tou= shmei/ou 
katakou/sas e)copli/zei th/n te du/namin dia\ ta/xous kai\ meta\
tw=n h(gemo/nwn prw=tos a)nabai/nei tou\s e)pile/ktous e)/xwn. katapefeugo/twn 
de\ *)ioudai/wn ei)s to\ i(ero\n kai\ au)toi\ dia\ th=s diw/rugos
ei)se/pipton, h(\n o( *)iwa/nnhs e)pi\ ta\ xw/mata tw=n *(rwmai/wn u(pw/ruce.
kai\ diasta/ntes a)p' a)mfote/rwn oi( stasiastai\ tw=n tagma/twn, tou=
te *)iwa/nnou kai\ tou= *si/mwnos, ei)=rgon au)tou\s ou)demi/an ou)/te i)sxu/os
ou)/te proqumi/as e)llei/pontes u(perbolh/n: pe/ras ga\r a(lw/sews u(pela/mbanon 
to\ *(rwmai/ous parelqei=n ei)s to\ a(/gion, o(\ dh\ ka)kei=noi tou=
kratei=n a)rxh/n. surrh/gnutai de\ peri\ ta\s ei)so/dous ma/xh kartera/,
tw=n me\n katalabe/sqai kai\ to\ i(ero\n ei)sbiazome/nwn, tw=n de\ *)ioudai/wn
e)cwqou/ntwn au)tou\s e)pi\ th\n *)antwni/an. kai\ ta\ be/lh me\n h)=n a)mfote/rois 
a)/xrhsta kai\ ta\ do/rata, spasa/menoi de\ ta\ ci/fh suneple/konto, 
kai\ peri\ th\n sumbolh\n a)/kriton h)=n o(pote/rwqen e(/kastoi ma/xointo, 
pefurme/nwn me\n tw=n a)ndrw=n kai\ peri\ th\n stenoxwri/an
dihllagme/nwn, th=s de\ boh=s a)shma/ntou prospiptou/shs dia\ to\ me/geqos. 
fo/nos te h)=n e(kate/rwqen polu/s, kai\ tw=n peso/ntwn ta/ te
sw/mata kai\ ta\s panopli/as patou=ntes e)/qrauon oi( maxo/menoi. a)ei\
d' e)f' o(po/teron bri/seien r(e/wn o( po/lemos, parake/leusis me\n h)=n
tw=n pleonektou/ntwn, oi)mwgai\ de\ tw=n trepome/nwn. ou)/te de\ ai( fugai\ 
to/pon ei)=xon ou)/te ai( diw/ceis, a)ll' a)gxw/maloi r(opai\ kai\ metakli/seis
memigme/nhs e)gi/nonto th=s parata/cews. toi=s d' e)/mprosqen ginome/nois
h)\ tou= qnh/skein h)\ tou= ktei/nein a)na/gkh parh=n ou)k ou)/shs a)nafugh=s:
oi( ga\r kata\ nw/tou pro/sw biazo/menoi tou\s sfete/rous par' a)mfoi=n
ou)de\ th=| ma/xh| metai/xmion kate/leipon. pleonektou/ntwn de\ tw=n *)ioudai/wn 
toi=s qumoi=s th\n *(rwmai/wn e)mpeiri/an kai\ klinome/nhs kaqa/pan
h)/dh th=s parata/cews, a)po\ ga\r e)na/ths w(/ras th=s nukto\s ei)s e(bdo/mhn
th=s h(me/ras e)pole/moun, oi( me\n a)qro/oi kai\ to\n th=s a(lw/sews ki/ndunon
e)/xontes a)ndrei/as e)fo/dion *(rwmai=oi de\ me/rei th=s duna/mews, ou)/pw
ga\r e)panabebh/kei ta\ ta/gmata, ka)kei/nois e)panei=xon oi( maxo/menoi
to/te, kratei=n th=s *)antwni/as a)poxrh=n e)pi\ tou= paro/ntos e)do/kei.

*)iouliano\s de/ tis e(katonta/rxhs tw=n a)po\ th=s *biquni/as, ou)k
a)/shmos w)\n a)nh/r, w(=n e)gw\ kat' e)kei=non i(sto/rhsa to\n po/lemon o(/plwn
te e)mpeiri/a| kai\ a)lkh=| sw/matos kai\ yuxh=s parasth/mati pa/ntwn
a)/ristos, o(rw=n tou\s *(rwmai/ous e)ndido/ntas h)/dh kai\ kakw=s a)munome/nous,
pareisth/kei de\ *ti/tw| kata\ th\n *)antwni/an, prophda=| kai\ nikw=ntas
h)/dh tou\s *)ioudai/ous tre/petai mo/nos me/xri th=s tou= e)ndote/rw i(erou=
gwni/as. e)/feuge de\ to\ plh=qos a)/qroun, ou)/te th\n i)sxu\n ou)/te th\n
to/lman a)nqrwpi/nhn u(polamba/nontes. o( de\ dia\ me/swn tw=n skedannume/nwn 
a)/llote a)/llh| dia/|ttwn e)fo/neue tou\s katalambanome/nous,
kai\ th=s o)/yews e)kei/nhs ou)de\n ou)/te tw=| *kai/sari qaumasiw/teron ou)/te
toi=s a)/llois pare/sth frikwde/steron. e)diw/keto de\ a)/ra kai\ au)to\s
u(po\ th=s ei(marme/nhs, h(\n a)mh/xanon diafugei=n qnhto\n o)/nta. ta\ ga\r
u(podh/mata peparme/na puknoi=s kai\ o)ce/sin h(/lois e)/xwn, w(/sper tw=n
a)/llwn stratiwtw=n e(/kastos, kai\ kata\ liqostrw/tou tre/xwn u(polisqa/nei,

h)/rqh boh\ peri\ ta)ndri\ deisa/ntwn, oi( de\ *)ioudai=oi perista/ntes au)to\n
a)qro/oi toi=s te custoi=s kai\ tai=s r(omfai/ais pa/ntoqen e)/paion. o(
de\ polu\n me\n tw=| qurew=| si/dhron e)cede/xeto, polla/kis de\ a)nasth=nai
peira/sas u(po\ tou= plh/qous tw=n tupto/ntwn a)netra/ph, kai\ kei/menos
d' o(/mws e)/nutte tw=| ci/fei pollou/s: ou)de\ ga\r a)nh|re/qh taxe/ws tw=| te
kra/nei kai\ tw=| qw/raki pefragme/nos pa/nta ta\ kai/ria pro\s sfagh\n
kai\ to\n au)xe/na sune/lkwn: me/xri koptome/nwn au)tw=| tw=n a)/llwn melw=n
kai\ mhdeno\s prosamu=nai tolmw=ntos e)ne/dwke. deino\n de\ pa/qos ei)sh/|ei
*kai/sara a)ndro\s ou(/tws e)nare/tou kai\ e)n o)/yei tosou/twn foneuome/nou:

ou) para\ *(rwmai/ois kai\ *kai/sari mo/non a)lla\ kai\ para\ toi=s
polemi/ois kle/os katalipw/n: *)ioudai=oi de\ kai\ to\n nekro\n a(rpasa/menoi
pa/lin tou\s *(rwmai/ous tre/pontai kai\ kataklei/ousin ei)s th\n *)antwni/an. 
h)gwni/santo de\ e)c au)tw=n e)pish/mws kata\ tau/thn th\n ma/xhn
*)aleca=s me/n tis kai\ *gufqe/os tou= *)iwa/nnou ta/gmatos, e)k de\ tw=n
peri\ *si/mwna *malaxi/as te kai\ o( tou= *me/rtwnos *)iou/das, kai\ *swsa=
ui(o\s *)ia/kwbos tw=n *)idoumai/wn h(gemw/n, tw=n de\ zhlwtw=n a)delfoi\
du/o, pai=des *)ari/, *si/mwn te kai\ *)iou/dhs.

*ti/tos de\ toi=s me\n su\n au)tw=| stratiw/tais kataska/ptein
prose/tace tou\s qemeli/ous th=s *)antwni/as kai\ th=| duna/mei pa/sh| r(a|di/an 
th\n a)/nodon eu)trepi/zein, au)to\s de\ to\n *)iw/shpon parasthsa/menos: 
e)pe/pusto ga\r e)p' e)kei/nhs th=s h(me/ras, *pane/mou d' h)=n e(ptakaideka/th, 
to\n e)ndelexismo\n kalou/menon a)ndrw=n a)pori/a| dialeloipe/nai 
tw=| qew=| kai\ to\n dh=mon e)pi\ tou/tw| deinw=s a)qumei=n: le/gein
tw=| *)iwa/nnh| pa/lin e)ke/leusen a(\ kai\ pro/teron, w(s ei) kai/ tis au)to\n
e)/rws kako\s e)/xoi tou= ma/xesqai, proelqo/nti meq' o(/swn bou/letai
polemei=n e)cei/h di/xa tou= sunapole/sqai th/n te po/lin kai\ to\n nao\n
au)tw=|, mhke/ti me/ntoi miai/nein to\ a(/gion mhde\ ei)s to\n qeo\n plhmmelei=n, 
parei=nai d' au)tw=| ta\s e)pileloipui/as qusi/as e)ktelei=n di'
w(=n a)\n e)pile/chtai *)ioudai/wn. kai\ o( *)iw/shpos, w(s a)\n ei)/h mh\ tw=|
*)iwa/nnh| mo/non a)lla\ kai\ toi=s polloi=s e)n e)phko/w|, ta/ te tou= *kai/saros 
dih/ggellen e(brai/+zwn, kai\ polla\ proshntibo/lei fei/sasqai
th=s patri/dos kai\ diaskeda/sai tou= naou= geuo/menon h)/dh to\ pu=r, tou/s
t' e)nagismou\s a)podou=nai tw=| qew=|. pro\s tau=ta tou= dh/mou me\n h)=n
kath/feia kai\ sigh/, polla\ d' o( tu/rannos loidorhqei/s te tw=| *)iwsh/pw|

ou)de\n h)se/bhsas, ta\s d' e)qi/mous qusi/as a)polamba/nei. ka)\n me\n sou=
tis a)fe/lh| th\n kaq' h(me/ran trofh/n, a)sebe/state, tou=ton h(/ghsai 
pole/mion, au)to\n d' o(\n th=s ai)wni/ou qrhskei/as e)ste/rhsas qeo\n e)lpi/zeis

a)nati/qhs, oi(\ me/xri nu=n kh/dontai tw=n h(mete/rwn no/mwn kai\ ta\s u(po\
sou= diakopei/sas qusi/as a)podi/dosqai tw=| qew=| bia/zontai; ti/s ou)k a)\n

gi/nh| xalepw/teros; a)lla/ toi, *)iwa/nnh, kai\ metanoh=sai me\n e)k kakw=n
ou)k ai)sxro\n e)n e)sxa/tois kai\ kalo\n u(po/deigma boulome/nw| sw/zein

strateu/santi tw=| *babulwni/w| di' au)to\n e(kw\n e)ce/sth pri\n a(lw=nai
th=s po/lews kai\ meta\ genea=s ai)xmalwsi/an u(pe/meinen e)qelou/sion u(pe\r
tou= mh\ paradou=nai tau=ta polemi/ois ta\ a(/gia kai\ to\n oi)=kon tou=
qeou= periidei=n flego/menon. dia\ tou=to lo/gos te au)to\n pro\s a(pa/ntwn
*)ioudai/wn i(ero\s u(mnei= kai\ mnh/mh r(e/ousa di' ai)w=nos a)ei\ ne/a toi=s
e)piginome/nois paradi/dwsin a)qa/naton. kalo/n, w)= *)iwa/nnh, u(po/deigma,
ka)\n prosh=| ki/ndunos: e)gw\ de/ soi kai\ th\n a)po\ *(rwmai/wn suggnw/mhn
e)gguw=mai. me/mnhso d' w(s o(mo/fulos w)\n parainw= kai\ *)ioudai=os w)\n
e)pagge/llomai, kai\ xrh\ skopei=n ti/s o( sumbouleu/wn kai\ po/qen.
mh\ ga\r e)/gwge/ pote genoi/mhn zw=n ou(/tws ai)xma/lwtos, i(/na pau/swmai 
tou= ge/nous h)\ tw=n patri/wn e)pila/qwmai. pa/lin a)ganaktei=s
kai\ ke/kraga/s moi loidorou/menos, a)ci/w| ge kai\ xalepwte/rwn, o(\s a)ntikru\s 
ei(marme/nhs ti parainw= kai\ tou\s u(po\ tou= qeou= bia/zomai
katakri/tous sw/zein. ti/s ou)k oi)=den ta\s tw=n palaiw=n profhtw=n

*tau=ta le/gwn o( *)iw/shpos met' o)durmou= kai\ dakru/wn lugmw=|

th=s proaire/sews au)to\n e)qau/masan, oi( de\ peri\ to\n *)iwa/nnhn parwcu/nonto 
ma=llon e)pi\ tou\s *(rwmai/ous e)piqumou=ntes e)gkratei=s gene/sqai 
ka)kei/nou. tw=n ge mh\n eu)genw=n pollou\s e)ki/nhsen o( lo/gos, kai\
tine\s me\n o)rrwdou=ntes ta\s fulaka\s tw=n stasiastw=n kata\ xw/ran
e)/menon, a)pw/leian me/ntoi sfw=n te au)tw=n kai\ th=s po/lews kategnw/kesan, 
ei)si\ de\ oi(\ kairofulakh/santes a)/deian a)naxwrh/sews pro\s tou\s
*(rwmai/ous kate/fugon. w(=n h)=san a)rxierei=s me\n *)iw/shpo/s te kai\ *)ihsou=s, 
ui(oi\ de\ a)rxiere/wn trei=s me\n *)ismah/lou tou= karatomhqe/ntos
e)n *kurh/nh|, kai\ te/ssares *matqi/ou kai\ ei(=s e(te/rou *matqi/ou, diadra\s
meta\ th\n tou= patro\s a)pw/leian, o(\n o( tou= *giw/ra *si/mwn a)pe/kteinen
su\n trisi\n ui(oi=s, w(s proei/rhtai. polloi\ de\ kai\ tw=n a)/llwn eu)genw=n
toi=s a)rxiereu=si summeteba/lonto. *kai=sar de\ au)tou\s ta/ te a)/lla
filofro/nws e)de/cato kai\ ginw/skwn a)llofu/lois h)/qesin a)hdh= th\n

*kat' e)kei/nhn me\n dh\ th\n h(me/ran tw=n *)ioudai/wn ka/mato/s te
kai\ kata/plhcis e)kra/thse ta\s o(rma/s: th=| d' e)piou/sh| sulleca/menoi/
te th\n i)sxu\n kai\ a)naqarsh/santes e)pekqe/ousi dia\ th=s a)natolikh=s
pu/lhs toi=s fu/laci tou= e)/cwqen i(erou= peri\ deute/ran w(/ran. oi( de\
karterw=s me\n e)de/canto au)tw=n th\n e)mbolh\n kai\ fraca/menoi toi=s
qureoi=s kata\ me/twpon w(/sper tei=xos e)pu/knwsan th\n fa/lagga, dh=loi
d' h)=san ou)k e)pi\ polu\ summenou=ntes plh/qei te tw=n e)ktrexo/ntwn
kai\ qumoi=s h(ttw/menoi. fqa/sas de\ th=s parata/cews th\n r(oph\n
*kai=sar, kaqew/ra ga\r a)po\ th=s *)antwni/as, e)ph/mune meta\ tw=n e)pile/ktwn 
i(ppe/wn. *)ioudai=oi de\ th\n e)/fodon ou)x u(pe/meinan, a)lla\ tw=n
prw/twn peso/ntwn e)tra/phsan oi( polloi/: kai\ u(poxwrou=si me\n toi=s
*(rwmai/ois e)pistrefo/menoi prose/keinto, metaballome/nwn de\ a)ne/feugon

ei)s to\ e)/ndon suneklei/sqhsan i(ero/n.

*ti/tos de\ a)nexw/rhsen ei)s th\n *)antwni/an diegnwkw\s th=s e)piou/shs 
h(me/ras u(po\ th\n e(/w meta\ pa/shs e)mbalei=n th=s duna/mews kai\
to\n nao\n perikatasxei=n. tou= d' a)/ra kateyh/fisto me\n to\ pu=r o(
qeo\s pa/lai, parh=n d' h( ei(marme/nh xro/nwn perio/dois h(me/ra deka/th
*lw/ou mhno/s, kaq' h(\n kai\ pro/teron u(po\ tou= tw=n *babulwni/wn basile/ws 
e)neprh/sqh. lamba/nousi d' ai( flo/ges e)k tw=n oi)kei/wn th\n
a)rxh\n kai\ th\n ai)ti/an: u(poxwrh/santos ga\r tou= *ti/tou pro\s o)li/gon
lwfh/santes oi( stasiastai\ pa/lin toi=s *(rwmai/ois e)piti/qentai, kai\

pu=r tou= e)/ndoqen i(erou=, oi(\ treya/menoi tou\s *)ioudai/ous me/xri tou=
naou= parhkolou/qoun. e)/nqa dh\ tw=n stratiwtw=n tis ou)/te para/ggelma
perimei/nas ou)/t' e)pi\ thlikou/tw| dei/sas e)gxeirh/mati, daimoni/w| o(rmh=|
tini xrw/menos a(rpa/zei me\n e)k th=s flegome/nhs  flogo/s, a)nakoufisqei\s 
de\ u(po\ sustratiw/tou to\ pu=r e)ni/hsi quri/di xrush=|, kaq'
h(\n ei)s tou\s peri\ to\n nao\n oi)/kous ei)sito\n h)=n e)k tou= borei/ou kli/matos. 
ai)rome/nhs de\ th=s flogo\s *)ioudai/wn me\n e)gei/retai kraugh\

feidw\ lamba/nontes ou)/te tamieuo/menoi th\n i)sxu/n, di' o(\ fulaktikoi\

*dramw\n de/ tis a)gge/llei *ti/tw|: ka)kei=nos, e)/tuxen de\ kata\

to\n nao\n ei)/rcwn to\ pu=r. kato/pin de\ oi(/ te h(gemo/nes ei(/ponto pa/ntes,
kai\ ptohqe/nta tou/tois h)kolou/qei ta\ ta/gmata: boh\ de\ h)=n kai\ qo/rubos 
a(/te thlikau/ths duna/mews a)ta/ktws kekinhme/nhs. o( me\n ou)=n
*kai=sar th=| te fwnh=| kai\ th=| decia=| diesh/maine toi=s maxome/nois to\
pu=r sbennu/ein, ou)/te de\ bow=ntos h)/kouon mei/zoni kraugh=| ta\s a)koa\s
prokateilhmme/noi kai\ toi=s neu/masi th=s xeiro\s ou) prosei=xon, oi( me\n
tw=| polemei=n, oi( de\ o)rgh=| perispw/menoi. tw=n de\ tagma/twn ei)sqeo/ntwn 
ou)/te parai/nesis ou)/t' a)peilh\ katei=xen ta\s o(rma/s, a)ll' o(
qumo\s a(pa/ntwn e)strath/gei: kai\ peri\ ta\s ei)so/dous sunwqou/menoi
polloi\ me\n u(p' a)llh/lwn katepatou=nto, polloi\ de\ qermoi=s e)/ti kai\
tufome/nois toi=s e)reipi/ois tw=n stow=n e)mpi/ptontes h(ttwme/nwn sumforai=s 
e)xrw=nto. plhsi/on de\ tou= naou= gino/menoi tw=n me\n tou= *kai/saros

me\n h)=n h)/dh tou= bohqei=n, fo/nos de\ pantaxou= kai\ troph/. to\ de\ ple/on
a)po\ tou= dh/mou lao\s a)sqenh\s kai\ a)/noplos o(/pou katalhfqei/h tis
a)pesfa/tteto, kai\ peri\ me\n to\n bwmo\n plh=qos e)swreu/eto nekrw=n,

*kai=sar d' w(s ou)/te ta\s o(rma\s e)nqousiw/ntwn tw=n stratiwtw=n

kai\ th=s para\ toi=s oi)kei/ois do/chs ou)k e)la/ttw. th=s flogo\s de\ ou)de/pw

sbennu/ein kai\ *libera/lion e(katonta/rxhn tw=n peri\ au)to\n logxofo/rwn
cu/lois pai/onta tou\s a)peiqou=ntas e)ke/leusen ei)/rgein. tw=n de\ kai\
th\n pro\s to\n *kai/sara ai)dw= kai\ to\n a)po\ tou= kwlu/ontos fo/bon
e)ni/kwn oi( qumoi\ kai\ to\ pro\s *)ioudai/ous mi=sos, kai\ polemikh/ tis

e)/leos ou)/t' e)ntroph\ semno/thtos, a)lla\ kai\ paidi/a kai\ ge/rontes kai\
be/bhloi kai\ i(erei=s o(moi/ws a)nh|rou=nto, kai\ pa=n ge/nos e)pech/|ei perisxw\n 
o( po/lemos, o(mou= tou/s te i(keteu/ontas kai\ tou\s a)munome/nous. 
sunh/xei de\ h( flo\c e)pi\ plei=ston e)kferome/nh toi=s tw=n pipto/ntwn
stenagmoi=s, kai\ dia\ me\n to\ u(/yos tou= lo/fou kai\ to\ tou= flegome/nou
me/geqos e)/rgou pa=san a)/n tis e)/doce kai/esqai th\n po/lin, th=s de\ boh=s
e)kei/nhs ou)de\n e)pinohqh=nai du/nait' a)\n h)\ mei=zon h)\ foberw/teron. tw=n
te ga\r *(rwmai+kw=n tagma/twn a)lalagmo\s h)=n sumferome/nwn, kai\ tw=n

kai\ pro\s to\ pa/qos oi)mwgai/. sunebo/a de\ toi=s e)pi\ tou= lo/fou to\

me/n ge tou= i(erou= lo/fon e)k r(izw=n a)/n tis e)/doce bra/ttesqai pa/ntoqen

a)po\ tou= naou= tou/s te o)belou\s kai\ ta\s e(/dras au)tw=n moli/bou pepoihme/nas 
a)naspw=ntes ei)s tou\s *(rwmai/ous h)fi/esan, au)=qis de\ w(s
ou)/te h)/nuo/n ti kai\ to\ pu=r e)p' au)tou\s a)nerrh/gnuto, e)pi\ to\n toi=xon
a)naxwrh/santes o)/nta o)kta/phxun to\ eu)=ros e)/menon. du/o ge mh\n tw=n
e)pish/mwn, paro\n swqh=nai pro\s *(rwmai/ous metasta=sin h)\ diakarterei=n

*dalai/ou.

tou= naou= flegome/nou pa/nta sunepi/mprasan, ta/ te lei/yana tw=n

de\ meshmbrinh=s: kai\ tau/tas u(/steron kate/skayan. e)/kaion de\ kai\
ta\ gazofula/kia, e)n oi(=s a)/peiron me\n xrhma/twn plh=qos a)/peiroi d'
e)sqh=tes kai\ a)/lla keimh/lia, sunelo/nti d' ei)pei=n, pa=s o( *)ioudai/wn

*to\n gou=n a)/qlion dh=mon oi( me\n a)patew=nes kai\ katayeudo/menoi

th\n me/llousan e)rhmi/an te/rasin ou)/te prosei=xon ou)/t'
e)pi/steuon, a)ll' w(s e)mbebronthme/noi kai\ mh/te o)/mmata mh/te yuxh\n
e)/xontes tw=n tou= qeou= khrugma/twn parh/kousan, tou=to me\n o(/te u(pe\r
th\n po/lin a)/stron e)/sth r(omfai/a| paraplh/sion kai\ paratei/nas e)p'
e)niauto\n komh/ths, tou=to d' h(ni/ka pro\ th=s a)posta/sews kai\ tou=
pro\s to\n po/lemon kinh/matos a)qroizome/nou tou= laou= pro\s th\n tw=n
a)zu/mwn e(orth/n, o)gdo/h d' h)=n *canqikou= mhno/s, kata\ nukto\s e)na/thn
w(/ran tosou=to fw=s perie/lamye to\n bwmo\n kai\ to\n nao/n, w(s dokei=n
h(me/ran ei)=nai lampra/n, kai\ tou=to pare/teinen e)f' h(mi/seian w(/ran:
o(\ toi=s me\n a)pei/rois a)gaqo\n e)do/kei, toi=s de\ i(erogrammateu=si pro\s
tw=n a)pobebhko/twn eu)qe/ws e)kri/qh. kai\ kata\ th\n au)th\n e(orth\n
bou=s me\n a)xqei=sa u(po/ tou pro\s th\n qusi/an e)/teken a)/rna e)n tw=|
i(erw=| me/sw|, h( d' a)natolikh\ pu/lh tou= e)ndote/rw naou= xalkh= me\n
ou)=sa kai\ stibarwta/th, kleiome/nh de\ peri\ dei/lhn mo/lis u(p' a)nqrw/pwn 
ei)/kosi, kai\ moxloi=s me\n e)pereidome/nh sidhrode/tois, kata/phgas 
de\ e)/xousa baquta/tous ei)s to\n ou)do\n o)/nta dihnekou=s li/qou
kaqieme/nous, w)/fqh kata\ nukto\s w(/ran e(/kthn au)toma/tws h)noigme/nh.
dramo/ntes de\ oi( tou= i(erou= fu/lakes h)/ggeilan tw=| strathgw=|, ka)kei=nos 
a)naba\s mo/lis au)th\n i)/sxusen klei=sai. pa/lin tou=to toi=s me\n 
i)diw/tais ka/lliston e)do/kei te/ras: a)noi=cai ga\r to\n qeo\n au)toi=s th\n
tw=n a)gaqw=n pu/lhn: oi( lo/gioi de\ luome/nhn au)toma/tws tou= naou=
th\n a)sfa/leian e)neno/oun, kai\ polemi/ois dw=ron a)noi/gesqai th\n pu/lhn,
dhlwtiko/n te e)rhmi/as a)pe/fainon e)n au(toi=s to\ shmei=on. meta\ de\
th\n e(orth\n ou) pollai=s h(me/rais u(/steron, mia=| kai\ ei)ka/di *)artemisi/ou 
mhno/s, fa/sma ti daimo/nion w)/fqh mei=zon pi/stews: teratei/a
de\ a)\n e)/docen oi)=mai to\ r(hqhso/menon, ei) mh\ kai\ para\ toi=s qeasame/nois 
i(sto/rhto kai\ ta\ e)pakolouqh/santa pa/qh tw=n shmei/wn h)=n
a)/cia: pro\ ga\r h(li/ou du/sews w)/fqh mete/wra peri\ pa=san th\n xw/ran
a(/rmata kai\ fa/lagges e)/noploi dia/|ttousai tw=n nefw=n kai\ kuklou/menai 
ta\s po/leis. kata\ de\ th\n e(orth/n, h(\ penthkosth\ kalei=tai, nu/ktwr 
oi( i(erei=s parelqo/ntes ei)s to\ e)/ndon i(ero/n, w(/sper au)toi=s e)/qos
pro\s ta\s leitourgi/as, prw=ton me\n kinh/sews e)/fasan a)ntilabe/sqai
kai\ ktu/pou, meta\ de\ tau=ta fwnh=s a)qro/as metabai/nomen e)nteu=qen. 
to\ de\ tou/twn foberw/teron, *)ihsou=s ga/r tis ui(o\s *)anani/ou
tw=n i)diwtw=n a)/groikos pro\ tessa/rwn e)tw=n tou= pole/mou ta\ ma/lista 
th=s po/lews ei)rhneuome/nhs kai\ eu)qhnou/shs, e)lqw\n ei)s th\n
e(orth/n, e)n h(=| skhnopoiei=sqai pa/ntas e)/qos tw=| qew=|, kata\ to\ i(ero\n 
e)capi/nhs a)naboa=n h)/rcato fwnh\ a)po\ a)natolh=s, fwnh\ a)po\ du/sews,
fwnh\ a)po\ tw=n tessa/rwn a)ne/mwn, fwnh\ e)pi\ *(ieroso/luma kai\ to\n

tou=to meq' h(me/ran kai\ nu/ktwr kata\ pa/ntas tou\s stenwpou\s perih/|ei 
kekragw/s. tw=n de\ e)pish/mwn tine\s dhmotw=n a)ganakth/santes
pro\s to\ kako/fhmon sullamba/nousi to\n a)/nqrwpon kai\ pollai=s
